review.LGPL-2.1: Linking obligations require legal review before release.
review.LGPL-3.0: Updated LGPL terms must be reviewed before distribution.
review.GPL-2.0: Copyleft reciprocity demands explicit legal approval.
review.GPL-3.0: Copyleft reciprocity demands explicit legal approval.
review.SEE-LICENSE-IN: Manual inspection required because the package defers to an external license file.
review.UNKNOWN: No license declared. Engineering must resolve before shipping.

forbidden.BUSL-1.1: Business Source License cannot be used in production builds.
forbidden.SSPL-1.0: Server Side Public License is incompatible with our commercial terms.
forbidden.ODbL-1.0: Open Database License restrictions conflict with our data policy.
forbidden.PROPRIETARY: Unvetted proprietary licenses are not permitted.

backend:fixnado-backend@0.1.0.reason: Internal service code distributed under company terms.

frontend:fixnado-frontend@0.1.0.reason: Internal web client distributed under company terms.

flutter:fixnado_mobile@0.1.0+1.reason: Mobile client is proprietary to Fixnado.
